title: Glasner chasing Premier League points record for Palace
description: Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner is chasing a Premier League points record ahead of their game at home to Nottingham Forest on Monday. The Eagles are currently on 45 points with four games remaining and need five more points to beat their record total, which was equalled for the third time last season. title: Real Madrid 3-2 Celta Vigo: What Were The Main Talking Points As Los Blancos Keep Their Slim Title Dreams Alive?
description: Managing to avoid what would have been an infamous collapse on Sunday afternoon, Real Madrid draged themselves to a nail-biting 3-2 victory against Celta Vigo. With their La Liga title dreams hanging by a threat, Carlo Ancelotti’s side opened the scoring in the 33rd-minute as Turkish starlet Arda Guler produced a sublime curling effort.
